Sanders: Senate office confirms that he has voted against the defense budget bills for fiscal years 2019, 2018, and 2017.
However: Sanders was not present in the Senate for the vote on the defense spending bill for fiscal year 2020, which he publicly opposed.
Tulsi Gabbard: another candidate in the Democratic primary, has also voted against all three of Trump's defense authorization bills, including the current $738 billion spending proposal.
